description: This JSON Schema describes an individual image acquired during the course of a SEM/FIB Tomography experiment.  Each image is taken using a detector (SE, BSE, EDS, EBSD) at each slice cut using FIB. This Schema contains only the parameters which are specific to the individual image. The parameters which are common to the entire set are described by another schema which describes the dataset as a whole and is located at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/main/SEM-FIB_Tomography/SEM_FIB_Tomography_acquisition_Dataset_Schema.json.

entryID.description: (Optional)- Identifier of the image produced by the machine

fileLink.description: (Optional)- Link to the location of the image

creationTime.description: (Required)- Time of creation of the image

definition.description: (Optional)- Name of the schema to which this entry conforms. In this case, acquisition_image should be written

stage.description: (Required)- Details concerning stage settings used for aquisition

vacuum.description: (Required)- Details concerning the vacuum during aquisition

temperature.description: (Optional)- Temperature of the sample during acquisition

specimenCurrent.description: (Optional)- Current measured on the specimen during acquisition of the image

title: acquisition_image

workingDistance.description: (Required)- Distance which is determined along the optical axis within the column from  (1) the lower end of the final optical element between the source and the  specimen stage; to (2) the point where the beam is focused. IRI: https://purls.helmholtz-metadaten.de/EMG/00000026

stageX.description: (Required)- X coordinate of the position of the stage

stageY.description: (Required)- Y coordinate of the position of the stage

stageZ.description: (Required)- Z coordinate of the position of the stage

stageM.description: (Optional)- M coordinate of the position of the stage (additional translation axis available in Zeiss instruments)

stageR.description: (Required)- Angle by which the stage is rotated

stageTa.description: (Required)- Tilt angle alpha of the stage

stageTb.description: (Required)- Tilt angle beta of the stage

specTilt.description: (Optional)- Pretilt of the sample, usually due to pretilted holder.

vacuum.description: Describes the vacuum maintained in the system.

chamberPressure.description: (Required)- The pressure maintained in the electron chamber

gas.description: (Required)- The gas used in the electron chamber

userMode.description: (Required)- The type of vacuum slected by the user

humidity.description: (Required)- Describes the humidity in the chamber during the measurement

identifierValue.description: (Optional) - String containing the value of an identifier

identifierType.description: (Optional) - Type of the identifier to be selected from: *ROR *GRID *ISNI *URL *DOI *Handle *String

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (Pa, hPa, kPa, MPa, GPa, mbar, bar, psi).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum).

value.description: (Required) - The angle expressed as an integer or floating point value.

unit.description: (Optional) - the unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (degree, radian).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - A qualifier to describe the value (e.g., avg, max, min).

distanceDetails.description: Describes a distance, size or length.

value.description: (Required) - Value of the distance, size or length.

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (nm, µm, mm, cm, m).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum).

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (K, ºC, ºF).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum).

unit.description: (Optional) - Unit of the value to be selected from a controlled list (pA, nA, µA, mA, A).

qualifier.description: (Optional) - Qualifier to describe the value (e.g., average, maximum, minimum).
